data.title: DOUJAT Jean (1609-1688) avocat, jurisconsulte, historiog…
data.meta_description:
DOUJAT Jean (1609-1688) avocat, jurisconsulte, historiographe de France (de l'Academie francaise).

2 P.A.S. "Doujat", Paris 1655-1682; woveoveove paper oblong in-12, and 1 page oblong in-8. 

Rare autograph receipts of the historian and jurist. December 31, 1655. Doujat, " Historiographe du Roy pour escrire l'Histoire de Sa Majté en latin ", receives 600 livres for the first two quarters of the pledges attributed to his charge... August 12, 1681 and January 24, 1682. Receipts as "former Doctor Regent of the Faculty of Civil and Canon Law at the University of Paris" for sums received as a deduction from his annuity .
